Package com.github.daytron.revworks.event

Provides classes for custom events and Guava's EventBus.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppEvent
    An abstract class that holds custom events for Guava's EventBus as inner classes.
    AppEvent.AdminLoginRequestEvent
    Custom event class for administrator login request.
    AppEvent.AdminSubmitNewAnnouncementEvent
    Custom event class for submitting new announcement from the Admin.
    AppEvent.CloseNotificationWindowEvent
    Custom event class for closing the popup notification window.
    AppEvent.InsertNotificationEvent
    Custom event class for creating new user notification.
    AppEvent.LecturerSubmitNewAnnouncementEvent
    Custom event class for submitting new announcement from the lecturer.
    AppEvent.LecturerViewCourseworkEvent
    Custom event class for launching the coursework view for the lecturers.
    AppEvent.OptionChangeValueEvent
    Custom event class for changing the option value in the OptionGroup object from the login view.
    AppEvent.StudentSubmitCourseworkEvent
    Custom event class for submitting new Coursework from the students.
    AppEvent.StudentViewCourseworkEvent
    Custom event class for launching the coursework view for the students.
    AppEvent.SubmitNewCommentEvent
    Custom event class for submitting new comment from the Comments panel in the coursework view.
    AppEvent.SubmitNewNoteEvent
    Custom event class for submitting new note from the Notes panel in the coursework view.
    AppEvent.ToggleCourseworkViewEvent
    Custom event class for toggling the maximise/minimise button in the coursework view for maximising or minimising the view.
    AppEvent.UpdateNoteIsReadWhenClickEvent
    Custom event class for updating note's status when its button is clicked in the Notes panel in the coursework view.
    AppEvent.UpdateNotificationButtonBadgeCountEvent
    Custom event class for updating the total unread user notifications badge count.
    AppEvent.UpdateNotificationToReadEvent
    Custom event class for updating opened notification's status to read.
    AppEvent.UserLoginRequestEvent
    Custom event class for student and lecturer login request.
    AppEvent.UserLogoutRequestEvent
    Custom event class for logout request.
    AppEvent.WebmasterLinkClickEvent
    Custom event class for launching Admin login popup window.
    AppEventBus
    Wrapper for Guava's EventBus.

Package com.github.daytron.revworks.event Description

Provides classes for custom events and Guava's EventBus.
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
